name: Conflict Styles Quick Game
description:
One of the Ombuds Office's many wokrshops explores the role of conflict styles in perpetuating and escalating conflict. This quick game lets you learn more about conflict styles.

On each page, you will dialog or action options in blue. Click the blue text you choose to advance to the next step.

For more information about UNLV/s Ombuds Office, please visit our website.
